title: HONOR LEVEL 3
body: I FINALLY GOT HONOR LEVEL 3? WTF?! first one?

replies.body: good luck on your B1 promo and grats on H3.  Whether you are first one or not is still a very admirable accomplishment.  Good job!

Honor 3 on my smurf, banned for 2 weeks on my main.  Makes sense. Especially because i have actually trolled on my smurf.  On my main, what have i done? Oh yeah, i asked if a person was duo becasue they called me a f6t.
Oh, don't worry, we won't need to lift a finger for you to get banned. You have that covered. :)

> [{quoted}](name=UnconsciousRage,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=q0tavWoG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-07-28T20:37:30.033+0000)
>
> Honor 3 on my smurf, banned for 2 weeks on my main.  Makes sense. Especially because i have actually trolled on my smurf.  On my main, what have i done? Oh yeah, i asked if a person was duo becasue they called me a f6t.

No, you got suspended cuz you typed F@6*0t in chat. Yes you were quoting someone and it's ridiculous, but no need to lie and say it's because you asked if someone was a duo. Don't lie. Just say it's because "I quoted someone calling me a f6t in champ select".

I remember saying it seems like an attention seeking act and I kinda felt like an asshole for saying that because it's saying you just wanted attention. Now I find you in other threads talking about it? An honor thread, and you mention your ban? Lol I guess I was right.
I got it today as well.

A lot of people (including me) just got honor level 3 today, so either there was a timer on how quickly you can rise in honor level that just ticked off today, or there was a hidden issue with the honor system that was preventing people from earning it that just got patched.

Anyways, I'm just happy I can start grinding Honor Capsules for Grey Warwick! ^3^

P.S. Hope your Bronze I Promo's go better than mine have... >.<
i get 2-3 honors EVERY GAME this is no joke... and yet i barely got any keyfrags nor do i have the feeling to be any close to h3.
You could play with friends and honor each other. I can't do this method since I don't have friends though.
does not work. the honors start to count less and less. we tried that with the old honor system. friend and i honored myself over 200 games. no ribbon.
that was old system.
so basically if i play with 4 premades and they all 4 honor me each game, i climb super fast and get super many keyfrags or what?
That was only in the old system, they said this system everything counts the same. So if you honor someone or a pre-mades honor someone it is the same value.
No they actually said that it doesnt count in the normal way with a premade you play with in many games.
Hihihi, lets be friends ðŸ˜Œ And tbh, I am playing mostly with my friends and Â´m getting honors from then and just yesterday I've reached the honor 3. So I think it also counts.

Just dont queue you get no honor for it, I queue with new players, bad players, and so forth and i get 2-4 honors a lot of games but it doesnt count.....Aka fml since it feel useless...I got a chat restriction because i quoted a flamer im at honor level 1 now cant get anything i still get honored just feels useless being nice now...
NIce work Man! Keep up with a good Sportsmanship. #ThreshMains
You sir are a legend, GJ!
#IT'S REAL!?!?!?
Nice, I just got it today too.
Congrats! I'm still working on mine (though I have been spamming mostly ARAM mostly)

I got it yesterday too! :O idk how but i did.  I didn't think it existed then I saw someone have it in an aram game and straight after that I got it. 
Good luck on promos to B1 btw, I kinda gave up on ranked XD Hope you have better luck.
http://prntscr.com/g2nwkr me too
wow a non salty bronze player im actually proud of you {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I just got honor 3 too!! Congrats!
me too lol
WOO Honor Level 3 FINALLY{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
